abstract: Analysts said that chains were keeping inventories lean, using marketing dollars strategically and quickly marking down slow-moving items.
snippet: Analysts said that chains were keeping inventories lean, using marketing dollars strategically and quickly marking down slow-moving items.
lead_paragraph: Even as worries grow about another economic downturn, major retail companies continue to report strong earnings, thanks to tough lessons from the recession.

headline.main: Retailers Glean Profit in Slow Sales
headline.print_headline: Retailers Glean Profit In Slow Sales
